com.percussion.cms.objectstore.server
Class PSBinaryFileValue

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSFieldValue
      com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSBinaryValue
          com.percussion.cms.objectstore.server.PSBinaryFileValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSFieldValue, Cloneable
public class PSBinaryFileValue
extends PSBinaryValue

A binary value that is created from a file in order to provide additional information from the original file reference such as file name, and mime type (from the file extension if there is one). This information is only provided during the save of the item if this class is used server-side, otherwise it will provide the same functionality as PSBinaryValue.

Constructor Summary
PSBinaryFileValue(File file)
          Reads the data from the supplied file and also stores the data in a temp file recording the file name and mime type info.

 PSPurgableTempFile getTempFile()
          Get the purgable temp file created during construction.

Constructor Detail

PSBinaryFileValue

public PSBinaryFileValue(File file)
                  throws FileNotFoundException,
                         IOException
Reads the data from the supplied file and also stores the data in a temp file recording the file name and mime type info. Use getTempFile() instead of getValue() or getValueAsString() to retrieve this information in addition to the data.

Parameters:
file - The file containing the binary data. The contents of the file are copied to a purgable temp file that includes the original path and mime type information. See getTempFile().
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the supplied file does not exist.
IOException - If there is an error reading from or writing to a file.
Method Detail

getTempFile

public PSPurgableTempFile getTempFile()
Get the purgable temp file created during construction.

Returns:
The file, never null.
